description: This table contains the financial decision for an appointment request in each location that was considered.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REQ_REGION_ID
columns.description: The facility profile ID of the region for a financial decision.

columns.name: REQ_NODE_CSN
columns.description: This stores the contact serial number (CSN) for the record that contains the financial decision information.
